headline: Did Intuit’s SMB Data Tie-Up Quietly Strengthen The Trade Desk’s (TTD) Competitive Moat?
summary: In late November 2025, Intuit announced that its SMB MediaLabs first-party small and mid-market business audience segments became available on The Trade Desk’s platform via LiveRamp, giving advertisers privacy-conscious access to millions of verified SMB decision-makers across connected TV, audio, display, and digital out-of-home channels. This integration enhances The Trade Desk’s appeal to brands seeking accurate, first-party SMB targeting, addressing a historically hard-to-reach but...

headline: The Trade Desk: Potential Value Trap - Recovery Likely Lumpy And Prolonged (Rating Downgrade)

headline: The Trade Desk: A Generational Buying Opportunity Emerges (Rating Upgrade)
summary: The Trade Desk offers a generational opportunity with low valuation, 18% Q3 growth, 43% margin, buybacks, and AI innovation. See why TTD stock is a strong buy.
